name: SinglePlayer
description:
Single Player was created during Forsbergs Game Jam 2019

Theme was love and we chose to create a game around Single People during valentines day. 

You play as a spirit that just wants to ruin the love for everyone and have a normal life with no colors and no sound.

Oliver Jonasson - Programmer
Sara Åkerström - 3d Artist
Freja Rasmusson - Technical 2d Artist
Axel Dahlborg - Concept Artist
Kenny Gustavsson - Technical Sound Design
